chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Now let's see how the match case works in Python programming.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Match case, if else, makes it a little easier for some cases.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: What does this mean?

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: This means that if you have a variable and you want to match it in different cases,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: then you can easily do it.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen and see how it will be clear.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So here I have made a new Jupyter notebook to save time,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: which is called 07 underscore matchcase.iponb.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And here I have told you about the match case.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So the match case statement that was introduced in Python 3.10,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: this pattern matching allows for a particular variable.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: If you are coming from C language, you will know about the switch.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: In C language, it is taught in B-Tech in the first year in India,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: so I am referring to it.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: In C language, as you can see the switch statement,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: most of the cases, everyone has seen it.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Switch statements work the same way.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: The syntax is something like this.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Suppose there is a variable called code,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: whose value can be 200, 400, 400, 400, or 500.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: What we do here is that we match each and every one of them.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Suppose there is a code value here,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: the value of the code is 500.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Now I want to write a syntax like this,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: which means that I match the code.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And I am saying something like this,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: that the code can be of 200,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: so what if it is of 200?

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: If the value is of 400, then what is it?

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Suppose the value is 200,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: then what will I do here? I will write case 200.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: If it is 200, then I will print it from the letter.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: The response is okay.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: If you do not know about HTTP codes,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: then I will tell you that the HTTP codes

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: tell us the response of our request.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: For example, the 200 means okay,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: 400 means bad request,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: 404 means 400, not found, okay?

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And 500 is an internal server error.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So we do this.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: First of all, we will write another case here.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: We will say case 400, if it is,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: then print it, bad response, bad response.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And here I will write another case here, which is 404.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And I will write print here, and I will write not found.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Okay?

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And here I will print like this, end of program.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Okay?

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So here I will close it like this.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And I will print shift enter, so here end of program is printed.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Because I did not make a case of 500.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So how did this code work?

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: How did this code work?

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: First of all, it matched case 200.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: If it was 200, then it would have been printed, response is okay.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Or I will say that if the case 200 was matched,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: then this code would have been executed.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Which is one line right now, but it could have been multiple lines.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: For example, I will write a good job here.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: I mean, our okay response comes when we

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: believe it normal.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: In most of the cases, when we are browsing the internet,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: then we expect the response okay.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: That's why the internet works right.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So here see that the code is equal to 500,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: the shift enter is done.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: The shift enter is done again.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And here see that the code is equal to 500.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: We matched the code.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: When the case was 200, then we printed the response.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And good job.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: If the case was 400, then this was printed.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: This was printed.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: This time I will do 200.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And I will show you by hitting shift enter that these two lines are printed.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So the case is 200 because it matched.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So the code that was in the case 200,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: it was executed.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: As you can see here, response okay.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Good job.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: The case was not executed because the code was not 400.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: It was not even 404.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Now sometimes we want to, as we know, we have done 2000.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Now I will run it.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So it will go straight to the end of the program.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: There will be no code execution from here.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So what do we do now?

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Sometimes we want that if any value is not matched,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: then show something.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Like here we have done the case and the score.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So for that we use underscore.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So whenever I write case underscore underscore,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: and I will write nothing matched here.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So now I will enter the shift.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So look, nothing matches because the value of the code is 2000.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: We could have done this with F statement.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So why did we use the match case?

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Sometimes the code is, its readability also matters a lot.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: For example, reading this code is very easy.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: When I say match code, then I understand that

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: I am matching the code name variable.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And when I make cases, it is very clear.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: It is very clear that if the code value is 200,

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: then these lines will be executed.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: If the code value is 400, then this line will be executed.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: If the code value is 404, then this line will be executed.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: If nothing matches, then this line will be executed.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: And this will be executed only because this is outside the match case.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: So this is how the match case works.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: Really very important concept.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: We will use it very much in data science.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: I hope you have enjoyed this course so far.

chunks.title: Match Case in python
chunks.text: See you in the next video.
